common.description: Administration system for food parcel distribution
common.loginToAccess: Please log in to access the application's features

auth.signInDescription: Sign in with your GitHub account to access the Matcentralen administration system.

errors.notOrgMember: You must be a member of the authorized organization to sign in.
errors.invalidProvider: Invalid account provider. Please use GitHub.
errors.configuration: There is a problem with the authentication configuration. Please contact support.
errors.accessDenied: Access denied. You don't have permission to sign in.
errors.verification: Verification failed. Please try signing in again.
errors.default: An error occurred while signing in. Please try again.

errors.notFound: Could not find the household. Please check that the ID is correct.
errors.createError: An error occurred while registering the household.
errors.updateError: An error occurred while updating the household.

success.title: Success
success.parcelsUpdated: Food parcels have been updated successfully!

error.title: Error
error.updateFailed: Failed to update parcels. Please try again.
error.unauthorized: You must be authenticated to manage parcels
error.forbidden: You don't have permission to perform this action
error.householdNotFound: The specified household does not exist
error.configurationError: Server configuration error. Please contact support.

validation.title: Could not save
validation.description: Parcels could not be saved due to validation errors
validation.summaryDescription: The following issues must be resolved:

householdForm.basicDescription: Fill in the basic contact information for the household. This information is used to contact the household.
householdForm.smsConsentDescription: Required to send pickup reminders and updates

validation.firstNameLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation.lastNameLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.phoneNumberFormat: Enter a valid Swedish phone number (7-10 digits)
validation.swedishNumbersOnly: Only Swedish phone numbers (+46) are supported
validation.phoneNumberInUse: This phone number is already registered with another household

duplicatePhone.title: Phone Number Already Exists
duplicatePhone.message: This phone number already belongs to household: {name} (ID: {id}). Phone: {phone}
duplicatePhone.fieldError: This phone number is already registered

similarName.title: Similar Household Found
similarName.message: A household with a similar name already exists. Please verify this is a new household:
similarName.confirmMessage: Similar households already exist. Are you sure this is a different household?

members.title: Household Members
members.description: Add all members of the household. This information is used to calculate food quantity and special needs.
members.noMembers: No members have been added yet
members.addInstructions: Fill in the age and select gender for each household member and then click on "Add Person" to add them to the list.

dietaryRestrictions.title: Dietary Restrictions
dietaryRestrictions.description: Select dietary restrictions that apply to the household. You can choose from the list or add your own restrictions.
dietaryRestrictions.addConfirmQuestion: Do you want to add the following dietary restriction to your application?
dietaryRestrictions.removeConfirmQuestion: Do you want to remove the following dietary restriction from your application?

validation.minLength: Dietary restriction must be at least 2 characters

pets.title: Pets
pets.description: Register pets in the household. This helps us to adapt the food assortment.
pets.addConfirmQuestion: Do you want to add the following pet type to your application?
pets.removeConfirmQuestion: Do you want to remove the following pet type from your application?

validation.minLength: Pet type must be at least 2 characters

additionalNeeds.title: Additional Needs
additionalNeeds.description: Select additional needs that the household may have. You can choose from the list or add your own needs.

validation.minLength: Need must be at least 2 characters

foodParcels.title: Scheduled Food Parcels
foodParcels.description: Schedule food parcels for the household with pickup location and times.
foodParcels.selectLocationFirst: Select a pickup location first to see availability
foodParcels.selectDatesHint: Select all dates when the household should receive a food parcel
foodParcels.bulkTimeHint: Set the same time for all food parcels, or cancel to edit individually.

bulk.notAvailableMsg: Selected dates have different opening hours. Edit times per date.
bulk.notAvailableMsgWithSummary: Selected dates have different opening hours: {summary}. Edit times per date.

foodParcels.individualTimeHint: Click on the times to change pickup time for each individual food parcel.

time.error: Earliest time must be before latest time
time.noAvailableTimesForToday: All times for today have passed. Please select a future date.

validationErrors.title: Validation Errors
validationErrors.capacityReached: Location capacity exceeded for selected date
validationErrors.doubleBooking: Household already has a parcel scheduled for this date
validationErrors.outsideOperatingHours: Selected time is outside operating hours
validationErrors.pastTimeSlot: Cannot schedule pickup in the past

review.title: Summary
review.editDescription: Review all information before updating the household.
review.createDescription: Review all information before saving the new household.

schedule.title: Food Support Scheduling

hub.title: Schedule
hub.subtitle: Select a handout location to view schedules
hub.favoriteExplanation: Setting a favorite will automatically take you there when browsing schedules, making it faster to access the location you use most often.

todayHandouts.title: Today's Handouts
todayHandouts.selectLocation: Select a location to view packages
todayHandouts.noLocation: Select a location to view today's packages
todayHandouts.noParcels: No packages scheduled today at this location

schedule.noFoodSupport: No food support scheduled this week
schedule.unavailableDay: This location is not open on this day
schedule.unavailableSlot: This time is outside opening hours
schedule.parcelsAffectedMessage: {count, plural, =1 {1 food parcel pickup} other {# food parcel pickups}} will fall outside the new opening hours.
schedule.parcelsAffectedExplanation: These parcels will appear in the 'Outside opening hours' section on the schedule page for easy rescheduling.

reschedule.title: Schedule food support for {name}
reschedule.confirmQuestion: Do you want to reschedule food support for {name}?
reschedule.successMessage: {name} has been rescheduled to a new time.
reschedule.pastError: Cannot schedule food support in the past.
reschedule.pastSourceError: Cannot reschedule food support from a time in the past.
reschedule.capacityError: This location has reached its maximum capacity for the selected date.
reschedule.slotCapacityError: This time slot is fully booked. Please select a different time.
reschedule.doubleBookingError: This household already has a parcel scheduled for the selected date.
reschedule.operatingHoursError: The selected time is outside the location's operating hours.
reschedule.timeError: Earliest time must be before latest time
reschedule.dateUnavailable: This date is not available for pickup
reschedule.noTimesAvailable: No available times on this date

notifications.smsQueued: SMS has been queued for delivery

historyModal.title: SMS History
historyModal.noHistory: No SMS messages sent for this parcel

warnings.parcelCountHigh: This household has received {count} food parcels (threshold: {threshold}). Consider reviewing their situation and providing additional support.

removal.confirmationPrompt: Type the last name to confirm:

errors.upcomingParcelsMessage: This household has {count, plural, =1 {1 upcoming food parcel} other {# upcoming food parcels}}.
errors.upcomingParcelsAction: Delete those parcels first, then remove the household.

comments.title: Comments ({count})
comments.placeholder: Add a comment about the household... (HTML is supported, e.g. links)
comments.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?

validation.title: Validation Error
validation.firstNameLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
validation.lastNameLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
validation.phoneNumberFormat: Enter a valid mobile number (9-10 digits)
validation.phoneDuplicate: This phone number is already registered to another household
validation.verificationIncomplete: All required verifications must be checked before proceeding
validation.smsConsentRequired: SMS consent is required to proceed

similarNameDialog.title: Similar Household Found
similarNameDialog.message: A household with a similar name already exists. Are you sure this is a different household?

verification.title: Staff Verification Checklist
verification.description: Please confirm the following before creating this household:

error.title: Error
error.create: An error occurred while creating the household
error.update: An error occurred while updating the household
error.verificationQuestionsLoadFailed: Failed to load verification questions. Cannot proceed without completing required checks.

addParcels.title: Add Food Parcels?
addParcels.message: This household has no upcoming food parcels. Would you like to add some now?

privacyConfirm.title: Privacy Policy Confirmation
privacyConfirm.message: Before completing the enrollment, please confirm that you have informed the household about how their personal data will be processed.
privacyConfirm.checkbox: I have informed the household about the privacy policy

handoutLocations.pageDescription: Manage the locations where food parcels are distributed, their opening hours, and settings.
handoutLocations.noLocations: No handout locations have been added yet
handoutLocations.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this location? This action cannot be undone.
handoutLocations.locationCreatedMessage: The handout location has been successfully created.
handoutLocations.locationUpdatedMessage: The handout location has been successfully updated.
handoutLocations.locationDeletedMessage: The handout location has been successfully deleted.
handoutLocations.errorLoadingMessage: There was an error loading the handout locations. Please try again.
handoutLocations.errorSavingMessage: There was an error saving the handout location. Please try again.
handoutLocations.errorDeletingMessage: There was an error deleting the handout location. Please try again.
handoutLocations.name: Location Name
handoutLocations.maxParcelsPerSlotDescription: Maximum number of parcels that can be booked in the same time slot (leave empty for no limit)
handoutLocations.maxParcelsPerSlotPositive: Max parcels per slot must be positive
handoutLocations.slotDurationDescription: Time allocated for each food parcel pickup
handoutLocations.slotDurationMaxExceeded: Slot duration cannot exceed 4 hours (240 minutes)
handoutLocations.slotDurationIncrement: Slot duration must be in 15-minute increments
handoutLocations.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
handoutLocations.weeklyHoursDescription: Set the regular weekly opening hours for this location. These hours will be used by default when scheduling food parcels.
handoutLocations.noWeeklyHours: No weekly opening hours have been set
handoutLocations.noSchedulesYet: No schedules have been added yet

endDate.afterStartDate: End date must be after start date

days.atLeastOneRequired: At least one day must be open

handoutLocations.scheduleOverlapMessage: This schedule overlaps with "{scheduleName}" ({startDate} to {endDate}). Please select a different date range.
handoutLocations.configureEachWeekday: Select the days of the week when this location is open, and set the opening hours for each day.
handoutLocations.confirmDeleteScheduleMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the schedule
handoutLocations.saveLocationFirst: Please save the location first before adding schedules
handoutLocations.noPastSchedules: No schedules to display. Try showing past schedules.
handoutLocations.errorFetchingLocation: An error occurred while fetching the location. Please try again.
handoutLocations.parcelsAffectedMessage: {count, plural, =1 {1 food parcel pickup} other {# food parcel pickups}} will fall outside the new opening hours.
handoutLocations.parcelsAffectedExplanation: These parcels will appear in the 'Outside opening hours' section on the schedule page for easy rescheduling.
handoutLocations.checkingAffectedParcels: Checking how many food parcels would be affected by this deletion...

verification.title: Verification Questions
verification.description: Manage verification questions that admins must confirm before creating households for this location
verification.questionTextSvPlaceholder: e.g. Jag har verifierat att hushållet bor i rätt postnummerområde
verification.questionTextEnPlaceholder: e.g. I have verified that the household lives in the correct postal code area
verification.helpTextSvPlaceholder: Additional guidance or explanation in Swedish
verification.helpTextEnPlaceholder: Additional guidance or explanation in English
verification.isRequiredDescription: Admin must check this box before creating household
verification.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this verification question?
verification.previewDescription: This is how admins will see this question in the household creation wizard:

parcelDialog.smsWarning: A cancellation SMS will be sent to the household.
parcelDialog.smsNoWarning: No SMS has been sent yet.

success.parcelDeletedMessage: The food parcel has been cancelled

errors.markPickupFailed: Failed to mark as picked up
errors.parcelAlreadyPickedUp: Cannot cancel a parcel that has already been picked up
errors.parcelInPast: Cannot cancel a parcel from the past

smsDashboard.title: SMS Management
smsDashboard.pendingCount: {count, plural, =0 {No pending SMS} =1 {1 pending SMS} other {# pending SMS}}

emptyStates.noPending: No pending SMS - All caught up! ✨
emptyStates.noResults: No SMS found with current filters

enrollmentChecklist.title: Enrollment Checklist
enrollmentChecklist.description: Staff checklist for all new households

examples.title: Example checklist items:
examples.item1: They have been told about pickup times and location
examples.item2: They understand the monthly parcel limit
examples.item3: I have verified their identity document
examples.item4: They have been informed about dietary restriction options

validation.textTooShort: Checklist item must be at least 10 characters

errors.VALIDATION_ERROR: Both Swedish and English text are required
errors.VALIDATION_ERROR_SV_EMPTY: Swedish checklist text cannot be empty
errors.VALIDATION_ERROR_EN_EMPTY: English checklist text cannot be empty

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Edit the privacy policy shown to households. The policy is available at /privacy
privacyPolicy.markdownHint: Use Markdown formatting for headers, lists, and emphasis.
privacyPolicy.placeholder: Enter the privacy policy content here...

notifications.emptyContent: Privacy policy content cannot be empty
notifications.cannotRemoveSaved: Cannot remove a language with saved content

parcelThreshold.title: Parcel Warning Threshold
parcelThreshold.description: Set the number of parcels after which to warn administrators about high household usage
parcelThreshold.infoMessage: When a household exceeds this number of parcels, a warning will appear on the household details page and when adding more parcels. This helps identify households that may need additional support or review.
parcelThreshold.thresholdDescription: Number of parcels before warning appears
parcelThreshold.warningPreview: Warnings will appear for households with more than {threshold} parcels

success.savedMessage: Parcel warning threshold has been updated

errors.loadFailedMessage: Failed to load parcel warning threshold
errors.saveFailedMessage: Failed to save parcel warning threshold

smsTemplates.title: Default SMS Templates
smsTemplates.description: Customize the text messages sent to households

modal.title: High Parcel Count Warning
modal.explanation: This household has exceeded the parcel limit threshold. Please verify that they have received appropriate support and assistance. You can still add more parcels, but this requires acknowledgment.
modal.acknowledgmentLabel: I acknowledge this household may need additional review or support

issues.title: Follow-up
issues.accessDenied: Access denied. You don't have permission to view issues.

failureDescription.internal: Could not send. Contact technical support.
failureDescription.provider: SMS not delivered. This usually means the phone number is not in use.
failureDescription.stale: No delivery confirmation received. Contact technical support.

toast.handedOutError: Failed to mark as handed out

errorCodes.NOT_FOUND: Could not find the item. It may have been deleted.
errorCodes.ALREADY_CANCELLED: This parcel has already been cancelled.
errorCodes.ALREADY_PICKED_UP: This parcel has already been handed out.
errorCodes.ALREADY_NO_SHOW: This parcel is already marked as no-show.
errorCodes.FUTURE_PARCEL: Cannot mark a future parcel as no-show.
errorCodes.ALREADY_DELETED: This parcel has already been deleted.
errorCodes.OUTSIDE_HOURS: Cannot send SMS for parcel scheduled outside opening hours.
errorCodes.COOLDOWN_ACTIVE: Please wait before sending another SMS.
errorCodes.FETCH_ERROR: Failed to load data. Please try again.
errorCodes.SEND_ERROR: Failed to send SMS. Please try again.
errorCodes.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

confirm.cancelParcelMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel the food parcel for {name}? This action cannot be undone.

issues.confirmCancelMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel this food parcel? This action cannot be undone.
